title: When do the X-Factor Celebrity live shows start and what channel is it on?
text:
The live shows will take the competition to the next level (Picture: Dymond/Thames/Syco/REX)

The X Factor Celebrity competition is hotting up as the famous contestants prepare to face off in the live shows.

Judges Simon Cowell, Louis Walsh and Nicole Sherzinger have chosen the acts who they think will perform best in the live shows and there’s been some surprise new additions to the line up in the form of Vinnie Jones and a twist that saw Jenny Ryan return after Nicole initially didn’t pick her for the live shows.

Simon has picked The Islanders, V5, Try Star and Max and Harvey for the Groups category.

Meanwhile Louis has got Jonny Labey, Kevin McHale, Olivia Olson and Megan McKenna in the ‘Unders’ and Nicole has taken through Victoria Ekanoye, Ricki Lake, Martin Bashir for the ‘Overs’ and Jenny Ryan for the ‘Overs’.

When do the X-Factor Celebrity live shows start?

Advertisement

Advertisement

Viewers looking forward to seeing how their favourite acts perform under the pressure of the live shows don’t have long to wait.

The X Factor Celebrity live episodes start tonight, Saturday 26 October, and it’s set to be an interesting and emotional first show.

New contestant to the show, Vinnie Jones, will be making his debut appearance tonight and will be singing some of his late wife Tanya’s favourite songs as a tribute to her, so have your tissues at the ready.

Vinnie’s wife Tanya passed away just before filming began for the show (Picture: Frank Trapper/Corbis via Getty Images)

Plus former Glee star Kevin McHale will be putting his vocal cords to the test and hoping he can impress the judges after falling ill earlier this week and leaving fans concerned that he may not be well enough to perform in the live shows at all.

What channel is X Factor Celebrity on?

You can watch tonight’s X Factor Celebrity and the very first live show of the season on ITV.

To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

Watch X Factor Celebrity tonight, Saturday 26 October, at 8.20pm on ITV.

description: The X Factor Celebrity competition is hotting up as the contestants prepare to sing in front of Simon, Louis and Nicole in the live shows.
